mapper.select: SELECT a.CUSTOMER_DEAL_ID AS CUSTOMER_DEAL_ID , a.STATUS_CD AS STATUS_CD , a.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID , a.BOSS_DEAL_ID AS BOSS_DEAL_ID , a.HOPE_DT AS HOPE_DT , a.HOPE_REGION AS HOPE_REGION , a.PEOPLE_COUNT AS PEOPLE_COUNT , a.OTHEN_CN AS OTHER_CN , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOSS_DEALS b WHERE b.ORG_CUSTOMER_DEAL_ID = a.CUSTOMER_DEAL_ID ) AS BOSS_DEAL_COUNT FROM TB_CUSTOMER_DEALS a WHERE a.BOSS_DEAL_ID is null
